sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function Customer(props) { const[customerDetails, setCustomerDetails] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { getCustomerDetails(); }); const getCustomerDetails = () => { axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/order/"+props.match.params.id).then((res) => { setCustomerDetails(res.data); }); }; return (
Customer Deatils
  • Customer Id :
    {customerDetails.id}
  • Name :
    {customerDetails.firstName}__{customerDetails.la}
  • Company Name (optional) :
    {customerDetails.companyName}
  • Delivery Address :
    {customerDetails.deliveryAddress}
  • Postal Code / Zip :
    {customerDetails.postalCode}
  • Town / City :
    {customerDetails.town}
  • Phone Number :
    {customerDetails.number}
  • Email Address :
    {customerDetails.email}
  • User Information :
    {customerDetails.info}
); } export default Customer;
